title: Support Multiple (AND) Context Filter Query in Suggestor
description:
Just as the normal query, usually we want to use multiple filter query when run auto-completion.

It would be great if suggestor can return (title of) doc that is meaningful to the current user where we need multiple filters.

Thanks
Jeffery Yuan
